title: Night 2 Democratic 2020 Debate Preview in Detroit
itunes:title: Night 2 Democratic 2020 Debate Preview in Detroit
description:
Kevin discusses the second night of the 2020 democratic presidential debate in Detroit with guests, Wendy Benjaminson, Bloomberg News 2020 Politics Editor, Francesca Chambers, White House correspondent for the Daily Mail, and Max Greenwood, National Political Correspondent for the Hill.

Kevin also discussed the debate format with Adrienne Watson, DNC War Room Director and Xochitl Hinojosa, DNC Communications Director.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
